name: A Tale of Valor
effect:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that card's cost.
"Perhaps you've heard the praises of our missing hero?" - Highlord Tirion Fordring

name: Apply This Twice a Day
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
If a hero or ally you controlled healed damage this turn, draw another card.
"This elixir should protect against their spit. Offer it to Ko'char for me, will you?" - Zort

name: Arcane Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Talent: Marksmanship

name: Ashbringer
effect: Invincible (This weapon can't be leave play or be targeted.)
"A finer blade has never been crafted by my hand." - King Magni Bronzebeard

name: Ashes to Ashes
effect:
Pay 1 to initiate this event.
Event: Draw a card for each ally that was destroyed this turn.
"You delivered the greatest fighting force this world has ever known, right into my hands - exectly as I inthended." - The Lich King

name: Blessed Defense
effect: Talent: Protection
Talent: Protection

name: Blessing of Defense
effect: Talent: Protection
Talent: Protection

name: Blessing of Trials
effect: Talent: Protection
Talent: Protection

name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
effect: Vampiric Bite: When Blood Quenn Lana'thel enters play, each opponent chooses an ally he controls.
"You have made an... unwise... decision."

name: Bolstering Our Defenses
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Horde] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"It will be a constant struggle here in the Plaguelands until we have fully driven back the forces of the alliance." - Emissary Gormok

name: Bronwyn Lightborn
effect:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
At the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, destroy target ability.
"If I must pay the ultimate price to defeat the Scourge, then so be it."

name: Brother Keltan
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, it may deal 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.
"We cannot defeat the Lich King on our own. Divided, all of will fall!"

name: Claemora Amberglare
effect: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn. (+2 ATK on your turn)
Her looks are all the distration her allies need to land a killing blow.

name: Commander Falstaav
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Once per turn: 2 ==> Target Unique ally has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.
"Dispatch the Scourge with all the zeal you can muster!"

name: Counterspell
effect: Talent: Arcane
Talent: Arcane

name: Crusade Commander Entari
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally for each Unique ally you control.
"Where both the Alliance and the Horde failed, the Argent Crusade succeeded."

name: Crusade Engineer Spitzpatrick
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card.
"We need fuel, and they need to die. We call that a 'win-win.'"

name: Crusader Lord Dalfors
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
If a Unique ally you control would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.
"We need every able-bodied man and woman to help keep the tide of evil at bay!"

name: Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner
effect:
FRONT: Song of Sylvanas: Sylvanas and allies in her party have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
On your turn: 7 > Flip Sylvanas.
BACK: Shriek of the Highborne: When Sylvanas flips to this side, she deals 7 shadow damage to target Scourge hero or ally.
Emprowered Song of Sylvanas: Sylvanas and allies in her party have Assault 2.
"You will not escape me that easily, Arthas! I will have my vengeance!"

name: Death's Gaze
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have fewer cards in your hand than in your graveyard, draw a card.
"This is a death's gaze orb. With it, we can observe the Scourge's actions and decide how best to strike." - Darkrider Arly

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
effect:
Protector
Blood Power: Deathbringer Saurfang has +1 ATK for each damage on him.
"Your soul will find no redemption here!"

name: Deathwhisper
effect:
Long-Range (When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deal no combat damage to the attacker.)
Heartstrike: If Sylvanas would deal damage with this weapon to a damaged Scourge, she deals double that much instead.

name: Defile
effect: Each opponent discards a card, turns a resource he controls face down, and destroys an ability and equipmant he controls.
"Your anguished cries will be a testament to my unbridled power." - The Lich King

name: Drudge Ghoul
effect: Servant on Undeath: You may play this ally from your graveyard.
"So... the Light's vaunted justice has finally arrived?"

name: Elder Achillia
effect: Inspiring Presence (If a hero or ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead)
"Your strength strengthens us all, comrade!"

name: Enemies, Old and New
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may remove a counter from target card in play.
"We cannot allow them a victory there, as Garadar would be next without a doubt." - Karrtog

name: Establishing New Outposts
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Alliance] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"We will establish new fortifications to tighten the noose around our enemies." - Emissary Whitebeard

name: Fallen Champions
effect:
Pay 2 to initiate this event.
Event: Draw a card for each opposing hero the was dealt damage this turn.
"Azeroth's fall will come at their hands - and you will be the first to die." - The Lich King

name: Father Gustav
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
You pay 1 less to play Unique allies, to a minimum of 1.
"There exists no greater calling for a champion than to fight for the Argent Crusade."

name: Festergut
effect:
Protector
Vile Gas: When Festergut enters play, he deals 5 shadow damage to each opposing hero.
"Fun time!"

name: Fire Blast
effect: Talent: Fire
Talent: Fire

name: Fireball
effect: Talent: Fire
Talent: Fire

name: Firewarden Wyland Kaslinth
effect: Assault 1 (+1 ATK on your turn)
"You go channel that rage. . .I'll channel something more interesting."

name: Frost Nova
effect: Talent: Frost
Talent: Frost

name: Frostbolt
effect: Talent: Frost
Talent: Frost

name: Frostmourne
effect:
Harvest Soul: When the Lich King deals fatal damage to an opposing ally with Frostmourne, add a +1 ATK counter to it, and the Lich King deals 2 frost damage to each opposing hero.
Death Rattle (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere): Put Frostmourne into its owner's hand.
"Frostmourne hungers." - The Lich King

name: Hammer of Justice
effect: Talent: Protection
Talent: Protection

name: Helm of Domination
effect:
Leader of the Scourge: Once per turn: 1 > Target ally has Ferocity this turn.
Death Rattle (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere): Put this armor into its owner's hand.
"Bow down before your lord and master!" - The Lich King

name: Highlord Tirion Fordring
effect:
FRONT: Touch of the Light: Tirion has Mend 1. (At the start of your turn, he may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
On your turn: 6 > Flip Tirion.
BACK: The Light's Vengeance: When Tirion flips to this side, search your desk and/or graveyard for Ashbringer and put it into play. Then, he deaks 2 unpreventable holy damage to target Scourge hero or ally for each friendly Paladin and Priest.
The Light's Blessing: Tirion has Mend 2.
"No more lives will be consumed by your hatred!"

name: Holy Light
effect: Talent: Holy
Talent: Holy

name: Hulstom, Servant of the Light
effect:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
"I have learned how to withstand the crushing blows of shadow, but I still have so much to learn."

name: Infest
effect: The Lich King deals 3 shadow damage to target ally. When that ally is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
"The end has come!" - The Lich King

name: Johnny Rotten
effect:
When Johnny enters play, he may deal 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
"Are you satisfied now? Because I can keep busting you up all night if you like."

name: Justice of the Grave
effect:
Pay 2 to initiate this event.
Event: Each opponent puts the top five cards of his deck into his graveyard. Dray two card.
"Is it truly righteousness that drives you? I wonder." - The Lich King

name: Kuz'vun
effect: Long-Range (While this ally is attacking, the defender can't deal combat damage to it.)
Joo walked right into my trap, mon.

name: Lady Bancroft
effect: Prevent all damage that opposing heroes would deal to this ally.
"The Scourge will be the first to attest that I am truly blessed."

name: Lady Deathwhisper
effect: Frostbolt Volley: When Lady Deathwhisper enters play, she deals 2 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.
"This shall be your final resting place."

name: Lady Jaina Proudmoore
effect:
FRONT: Brilliance Aura: If Jaina would deal damage with an ability, she deals that much +1 instead.
On your turn: 8 > Flip Jaina.
BACK: Teleport: When Jaina flips to this side, you may search your deak for up to two allies and put them into play.
Emprowered Brilliance Aura: If Jaina would deal damage with an ability, she deals that much +2 instead.
"You won't deny me this, Arthas! I must know... I must find out..."

name: Lifemender Dorn
effect: Once per turn: 1 ==> Dorn heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
"Compared to the tauren, nature is a fragile creature. For us to live among it, we must practice restraint."

name: Lord Marrowgar
effect: Bone Storm: When Lord Marrowgar is destroyed, he deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero for each ally in its controller's graveyard.
"BONE STORM"

name: Madrea Bluntbrew
effect:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
When this ally enters play, look at target opponent's hand and choose an ability or equipment. He discards that card.
I can see that you really aren't that much of a threat.

name: Multi-Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Talent: Marksmanship

name: Necrotic Plague
effect:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of the Lich King's turn, he deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero for each ally in its controller's graveyard.

name: Olaf Steelbreaker
effect: Protector
"Without preparation and planning, there can be no victory!"

name: Pain and Suffering
effect:
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies have -2 ATK while attacking.
At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, the Lich King deals 4 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

name: Petreus Roffe
effect: Protector
"May the Light guide me so that I may free Azeroth from the clutch of death."

name: Prince Keleseth
effect:
When Prince Keleseth enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Valanar and a second card named Prince Taldaram and put them into play.
Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
"Blood will flow!"

name: Prince Taldaram
effect:
When Prince Taldaram enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Valanar and a second card named Prince Keleseth and put them into play.
Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
"Delight in the pain!"

name: Prince Valanar
effect:
When Prince Valanar enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Keleseth and a second card named Prince Taldaram and put them into play.
Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
"Naxxanar was merely a setback!"

name: Professor Putricide
effect:
Protector:
Unstable Experiment: At the end of your turn, roll a die. When you roll a die this way, Professor Putricide deals that much nature damage to target hero or ally.
"Good news, everyone!"

name: Proving Grounds
effect:
On your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"All newcomers to the Valley must first complete the rite of battle." - Warmaster Laggrond

name: Quake
effect: Exhaust all opposing cards.
"Watch as the world around you collapses!"

name: Raging Spirit
effect:
Target opponent reveals his hand, and you put an ally from it into play under your control with ability attached to it.
Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2 and is also a Scourge ally.

name: Redemption
effect: Talent: Holy
Talent: Holy

name: Remorseless Winter
effect:
Ongoing: This ability enters play with four frozen counters.
When an opponent plays a card, the Lich King deals 5 frost damage to that player's hero, then remove a frozen counter from this ability. If none remain, destroy this ability.

name: Rise and Be Recognized
effect:
On your turn, par 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.
"Most do not live long enough to rise above their own mediocrity." - Lieutenant Haggerdin

name: Rotface
effect:
Protector
Slime Spray: At the start of each opponent's turn, Rotface deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally that player control.
"Icky sticky."

name: Scorch
effect: Talent: Fire
Talent: Fire

name: Sear
effect: Talent: Fire
Talent: Fire

name: Servants of Undeath
effect:
On your turn: Pay 1 to initiate this event.
Event: Put up to two target cards from your graveyard into your hand.
"Watch now as I raise them from the dead to become masters of the Scourge." - The Lich King

name: Shambling Horror
effect: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
"When my work is complete, you will beg for mercy... and I will deny you."

name: Sindragosa
effect: Icy Grip: If an opposing hero or ally attacks, it must attack Singragosa if able.
"Your incursion ends here! None shall survive."

name: Sister Colleen Tulley
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
This ally has Mend 1 for each Unique ally you control.
"The strength of the Argent Crusade lies in our unwavering faith in the Light and in each other."

name: Soul Reaper
effect: Interrupt target card. If you do, the Lich King heals damage from himself equal to that card's cost.
"Hope wanes!" - The Lich King

name: Staff of Antonidas
effect: Courage of Antonidas: On your turn: Exhaust Jaina > Reveal the top card of your deck. This turn, you may put it into your hand, play it for free, or if it a quest, place it as an additional resource.

name: Steady Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Talent: Marksmanship

name: Tani Bixtix
effect: At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 nature damage to target Scourge hero or ally.
"Little by little, we chip away at the Scourge ranks."

name: The Lich King
effect:
FRONT: Undeath's Armaments: At the start of your turn, if you control two or more resources, you may search your desk for a card named Frostmourne or Helm of Domination and put it into play.
On your turn: 10 > Flip the Lich King.
BACK: Fury of Frostmourne: At the start of your turn, the Lich King deals 300,000 unpreventable shadow damage to each opposing hero.
"Come then, champions! Feed me your rage!"

name: The One True King
effect:
Pay 1 to initiate this event.
Event: Draw a card.
"No question remains unanswered. No doubts linger." - The Lich King

name: Tirion's Gambit
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed Unique card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"And now I learn that it might be Arthas's own heart a thing containing the last bit of his remaining humanity." - Highlord Tirion Fording

name: Turn the Blade
effect: Talent: Survival
Talent: Survival

name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
effect: Protector

name: Val'kyr Shadowguard
effect: Grab and Drop: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ally.
"Val'kyr, your master calls!" - The Lich King

name: Valithria Dreamwalker
effect:
Valthira Dreamwalker enters play with 3 damage.
Emerald Vigor: At the start of your turn, draw a card if Valthira Dreamwalker is damaged.
Valthira Dreamwalker can't attack or be attacked.
"Heroes, lend me your aid!"

name: Vesh'ral
effect: Ferocity (Can attack immediately)

name: Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Unique ally you control.
"Wear the tabard of the Argent Crusade with pride and honor!"

name: Vile Spirit
effect: Spirit Burst: When this ally is destroyed, it deals 5 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
"I would not want the Light's greatest champion to miss seeing the wretched world remade in my image." - The Lich King

name: Vindictive Strike
effect: Talent: Retribution
Talent: Retribution

name: Waz'luk
effect: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
He makes quite a first impression.

name: Whiteout
effect: Talent: Frost
Talent: Frost

name: Wynnd the Spry
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Wynnd has +1 ATK for each exhausted opposing resource.
"I move as swiftly and softly as the breeze."

name: Your Fortune Awaits You
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
Fortune favors the bold.

name: Zugna, Windseer Apprentice
effect:
Assault 1
When this ally exhausts for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready her.
"Tarus has taught me well. Shall I show you?"
